dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, hey, have you been following what's happening with AI in Kazakhstan? Like, big news coming out this week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, hey, have you been following what's happening with A I in Kazakhstan? Like, big news coming out this week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, I saw something. They're actually, um, going to hold dedicated parliamentary hearings on artificial intelligence, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, I saw something. They're actually, um, going to hold dedicated parliamentary hearings on artificial intelligence, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan will hold dedicated parliamentary hearings on artificial intelligence, announced Mazhilis Speaker Yerlan Koshanov.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Mazhilis Speaker Yerlan Koshanov announced it. And it all kind of kicked off with this deputy, Yekaterina Smyshlyayeva.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Mazhilis Speaker Yerlan Koshanov announced it. And it all kind of kicked off with this deputy, Yekaterina Smyshlyayeva.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan will hold dedicated parliamentary hearings on artificial intelligence, announced Mazhilis Speaker Yerlan Koshanov. Mazhilis deputy Yekaterina Smyshlyayeva submitted a formal inquiry to Prime Minister Olzhas Bektenov, addressing the development of AI in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, Smyshlyayeva. She sent a formal inquiry to the Prime Minister, like, really pushing for some structure around AI development there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, Smyshlyayeva. She sent a formal inquiry to the Prime Minister, like, really pushing for some structure around A I development there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mazhilis deputy Yekaterina Smyshlyayeva submitted a formal inquiry to Prime Minister Olzhas Bektenov, addressing the development of AI in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and her proposals are pretty interesting. She's talking about a mandatory assessment of digital maturity or a national readiness index *before* large-scale AI use.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and her proposals are pretty interesting. She's talking about a mandatory assessment of digital maturity or a national readiness index before large-scale A I use.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: She proposed introducing a mandatory assessment of the digital maturity of economic sectors or a national readiness index before large-scale use of AI, accompanied by regulatory audits.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which, honestly, makes a lot of sense. And, uh, she also wants regulatory audits and to elevate the AI development concept within state planning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, honestly, makes a lot of sense. And, uh, she also wants regulatory audits and to elevate the A I development concept within state planning.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: She proposed introducing a mandatory assessment of the digital maturity of economic sectors or a national readiness index before large-scale use of AI, accompanied by regulatory audits. Additionally, we propose elevating the status of the AI development concept within the state planning system to ensure its provisions are considered in strategy and program development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] So, like, actual thoughtful governance, not just letting it run wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, actual thoughtful governance, not just letting it run wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! And she even proposed creating model AI application regulations based on international safety standards, to be reviewed by a dedicated AI committee.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! And she even proposed creating model A I application regulations based on international safety standards, to be reviewed by a dedicated A I committee.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Based on international safety standards, we suggest creating model AI application regulations for various industries and ensuring they are reviewed by a dedicated AI committee, said Smyshlyayeva.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's pretty comprehensive. And the Speaker, Koshanov, he's totally on board with her, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's pretty comprehensive. And the Speaker, Koshanov, he's totally on board with her, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Yerlan Koshanov expressed his support for Yekaterina Smyshlyayeva™s inquiry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. He even reminded everyone that President Tokayev is personally overseeing AI development in the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. He even reminded everyone that President Tokayev is personally overseeing A I development in the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He reminded that President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev personally oversees the development of artificial intelligence in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, so it's really top-down. And Koshanov mentioned they've actually already passed a draft law on AI in the first reading?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, so it's really top-down. And Koshanov mentioned they've actually already passed a draft law on A I in the first reading?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We, the Mazhilis deputies, have also taken an important step by initiating and passing the draft law on artificial intelligence in the first reading.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's what he said! They're looking at the second reading in September. And he's pushing for these joint parliamentary hearings, um, with the government, this fall.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's what he said! They're looking at the second reading in September. And he's pushing for these joint parliamentary hearings, um, with the government, this fall.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We will review it in the second reading in September, said Koshanov. The Speaker proposed holding a joint parliamentary hearing with the government on the issue this fall.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] With the government? That's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: With the government? That's a big deal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? He's, like, thinking the second half of September for that. And they want to gather the best international experts, local developers, specialists—the whole nine yards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? He's, like, thinking the second half of September for that. And they want to gather the best international experts, local developers, specialists-the whole nine yards.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I believe we could hold it in the second half of September. We should gather the best international experts, local developers, and specialists at our venue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, a real concerted effort to get this right.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, a real concerted effort to get this right.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seems that way. Very proactive, if you ask me, especially when you look at how other countries are, you know, scrambling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seems that way. Very proactive, if you ask me, especially when you look at how other countries are, you know, scrambling.
